basics.name: Jos Lee Josue Villegas Pacheco
basics.label: Diseñador UI y Web con más de 2 años de experiencia
basics.summary: UI and Web designer with more than two years of experience in the field through teaching workshops to high school students and creating personal projects for both web and mobile devices.

work.name: Dictado de Taller UI Desing
work.summary: In charge of teaching the UI Design workshop course at the Sollertia school, I promoted the Design of websites or mobile applications as an aid to the proposed solutions of each student, promoting the use of their creativity
highlights: Create sketches that will help with future designs
Create friendly and attractive designs in Figma and/or Adobe XD
Verify that the design meets the requested needs

work.name: Dictado de Taller Desarrollo Web
work.summary: In charge of teaching the Web Development workshop course at the Sollertia school, I encouraged the creation of websites previously designed by each student, promoting their logic and creativity through the use of HTML tag code and CSS styling language
highlights: Know how UI designs serve as a basis for future designs made with web code
Add styles with CSS to previously made designs

work.name: Sistema de Prácticas Pre Profesionales
work.summary: I implemented the monitoring module for students in the process of pre-professional internships in the PPP system of the Universidad Peruana Unión
highlights: Prepare the analysis of the module, follow-ups of students in the internship process
Develop the monitoring requirement for students in the internship process
Develop the monitoring requirement for students in internship exam
Develop the monitoring requirement for students in internship final

awards.title: Excelencia Académica
awards.summary: Mejor estudiante en el semestre 2020-2 de la UPeU
